quote_first: Delivery had been by messenger service and the office stamp showed
quote_last: as the time out. I opened the envelope and drew out the shiny 4¼ by 3¼ photo that was all there was inside.
title: The Bug Sleep
author: Raymond Chandler

quote_last: by the big clock of the central building when Mathieu crossed the yard towards the office which he occupied as chief designer. For eight years he had been employed at the works where, after a brilliant and special course of study, he had made his beginning as assistant draughtsman when but nineteen years old, receiving at that time a salary of one hundred francs a month.
title: Fruitfulness
author: Emile Zola

quote_first: Old gummy granny (thrusts a dagger towards Stephen’s hand) Remove him, acushla. At
quote_last: you will be in heaven and Ireland will be free (she prays) O good God take him!
title: Ulysses
author: James Joyce
